mapper.select: SELECT pr.fk_placeId, pr.fk_reviewId, r.review, r.title, r.rating, r.upvotes, u.name, u.surname, p.url as photoUrl FROM PLACE_REVIEW pr INNER JOIN REVIEW r ON pr.fk_reviewId = r.reviewId INNER JOIN USERS u ON r.fk_userToken = u.userToken LEFT JOIN PHOTO p ON u.fk_photoId = p.photoId WHERE pr.fk_placeId = #{id}

SELECT pr.fk_placeId, pr.fk_reviewId, r.review, r.title, r.rating, r.upvotes, u.name, u.surname, r.timeAdded, p.url as photoUrl FROM PLACE_REVIEW pr INNER JOIN REVIEW r ON pr.fk_reviewId = r.reviewId INNER JOIN USERS u ON r.fk_userToken = u.userToken LEFT JOIN PHOTO p ON u.fk_photoId = p.photoId WHERE pr.fk_placeId = #{id}
ORDER BY r.timeAdded
ORDER BY r.timeAdded DESC
ORDER BY r.upvotes DESC
SELECT COUNT(pr.fk_placeId) as total FROM `PLACE_REVIEW` pr WHERE fk_placeId=#{id}
SELECT IFNULL((SELECT AVG(r.rating) FROM PLACE_REVIEW pr INNER JOIN REVIEW r ON pr.fk_reviewId = r.reviewId WHERE pr.fk_placeId = #{id}),0) as rating
